context.text: DragonForce discography - Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
This is the discography of the power metal band DragonForce . They have released five albums and three singles.

entity.htmlSnippet:
TitleDateTrack Listing
Valley of the Damned (demo)June 2000
  1. Valley of the Damned
  2. Revelations
  3. Starfire
  4. Black Winter Night
  5. Disciples of Babylon
Valley of the DamnedFebruary 2003
  1. Invocation of Apocalyptic Evil
  2. Valley of the Damned
  3. Black Fire
  4. Black Winter Night
  5. Starfire
  6. Disciples of Babylon
  7. Revelations
  8. Evening Star
  9. Heart of a Dragon
  10. Where Dragons Rule (Japanese release bonus track)
Sonic FirestormMay 2004
  1. My Spirit Will Go On
  2. Fury of the Storm
  3. Fields of Despair
  4. Dawn over a New World
  5. Above the Winter Moonlight
  6. Soldiers of the Wasteland
  7. Prepare for War
  8. Once in a Lifetime
  9. Cry of the Brave (Short Version) (Japanese release bonus track)
Inhuman RampageJanuary 2006
  1. Through the Fire and the Flames
  2. Revolution Deathsquad
  3. Storming the Burning Fields
  4. Operation Ground and Pound
  5. Body Breakdown
  6. Cry for Eternity
  7. The Flame of Youth
  8. Trail of Broken Hearts
  9. Lost Souls in Endless Time (Japanese release bonus track)
Inhuman Rampage Special EditionMarch 2007
